titleInfo.title: Doing It Again and Again May Be Difficult, But It Depends on What You Are Doing
Proceedings of the 27th West Coast Conference on Formal Linguistics

bibliographicCitation.lncs: Bott, O.: Doing It Again and Again May Be Difficult, But It Depends on What You Are Doing. In: Abner, N. and Bishop, J. (eds.) Proceedings of the 27th West Coast Conference on Formal Linguistics. p. 63-71. Cascadilla Proceedings Project, Somerville, MA (2008).
bibliographicCitation.chicago: Bott, Oliver. 2008. “Doing It Again and Again May Be Difficult, But It Depends on What You Are Doing”. In Proceedings of the 27th West Coast Conference on Formal Linguistics, ed. Natasha Abner and Jason Bishop, 63-71. Somerville, MA: Cascadilla Proceedings Project.
